original_text: So his brothers said to him, “Leave here and go to Judea, that your disciples also may see the works you are doing.
korean_text: 그 형제들이 예수께 이르되 당신이 행하는 일을 제자들도 보게 여기를 떠나 유대로 가소서

sentences.original_text: So his brothers said to him,
Leave here and go to Judea,
that your disciples also may see the works you are doing.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 제자들도 네가 행하는 일들을 볼 수 있도록.
